sentences: Dagvyn Luvsansharav (Mongolian: Дагвын Лувсаншарав; 1927-2014) is a Mongolian composer.
Described as having a "rich repertoire of Mongolian songs which have a special place",  he is perhaps best known for his Sükhbaataryn Magtuu (Praise of Sükhbaatar) or his ballet Legend of the Sun.
His music featured in the 1994 Mongolian film Toorog, directed by Yondonbaliin Tserendolgor.
